A

AnsiCodeEnum - Enum in dev.vince.colorify.ansi
The AnsiCodeEnum class is an enum that contains all the ANSI color codes and ANSI format codes.
AnsiCodeEnum.AnsiCodeType - Enum in dev.vince.colorify.ansi
 
AnsiFormat - Class in dev.vince.colorify.format
The AnsiFormat class is a class that allows you to format a String with ANSI color codes.
AnsiFormat(AnsiCodeEnum...) - Constructor for class dev.vince.colorify.format.AnsiFormat
Initializes a new AnsiFormat with the specified AnsiColorEnums to use to format the String.
AnsiUtil - Class in dev.vince.colorify.util
The AnsiUtil class contains methods to manages Ansi codes and ANSI support on Windows.
apply(String) - Method in enum dev.vince.colorify.ansi.AnsiCodeEnum
Applies the ANSI code to the given String and resets the code.
AUTHOR - Static variable in class dev.vince.colorify.Colorify
